Text:
Great movie and quality!
I tried five (5) 2CD versions which all "chopped" heavily (especially the first minute) probably due to all the slow panning with high detail, even though my DVD player is brand new and usually brilliant with DivX&XviD. The NeDIVx version is much better at this. So seed it!

PS Swedish subs, already synced, available at:
http://www.undertexter.se/?p=subark&id=5041
